description.en: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: O Ceifador não vai matar seu mestre. No entanto, não há como dizer o que ele pode fazer a todos os outros! Este pet segue seu dono e recolhe os itens caídos.
description.cns: 这个死神不会杀死它的主人。 不过，没有人知道它会对其他人造成什么影响！ 这只宠物跟随它的主人并捡起掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein gar nicht so furcherregender Ripper, der seinem Besitzer auf Schritt und Tritt folgt und dabei Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: Même si la mort vous court après, elle n'est pas là contre vous. Faites tout de même attention à la faux ! Ce bébé se promène avec son maître tout en ramassant les objets laissés par les monstres et en améliorant ses performances au combat.
description.id: Baby Ripper Cage tidak akan membunuh tuannya. Tapi tidak ada jaminan jika dia tidak akan melakukannya pada orang lain! Dia akan setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang yang jatuh
description.it: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: 鎌を振り回す死神を召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 베이비 리퍼를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.sp: No matará a su dueño. ¡Pero, no se sabe lo que podría hacerle a los demás! Esta mascota sigue a su dueño y recoge objetos soltados.
description.sw: The Reaper won't slay its master. There is no telling what it might do to everyone else, though! This pet follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: The Reaper จะไม่สังหารเจ้านายของมัน ไม่มีการบอกว่ามันจะทำอะไรกับคนอื่นได้! สัตว์เลี้ยงตัวนี้ตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除鐮刀死神寶寶，周圍有道具時會自動拾取。
description.vi: Reaper sẽ không giết chủ nhân của nó. Tuy nhiên, không có gì nói trước được nó có thể làm gì với những người khác! Con vật cưng này đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
